channel.title: AntzScape Development Thread
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/banner.png[/img]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/AntzScape][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-facebook.png[/img][/url] [url=https://twitter.com/AntzScape][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-twitter.png[/img][/url] [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/AntzScape][img]http://dl.dropbox.com/u/18329363/icon-youtube.png[/img][/url] [/center] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_VZfSrmGl0k&context=C4bc46aaADvjVQa1PpcFOk3H3HKePrJbceduf7MrDchY5Tv0lqJUQ=[/youtube] [i]^^My fail attempt at making a good Promo^^[/i]
AntzScape is a 317 Server, loading 602 Anims, Items, etc. AntzScape first Started in 2008, but I am not gonna go into detail about the history and why it went down.
Well, enough talking, lets get on with the Thread! [b] Features[/b] [i]Will color Code later[/i] Combat Weapon specials. Weapon/Block sounds. Weapon poisoning. Player versus Player. Player versus NPC. Custom combat actions. Equipment effects (barrows equipment, slave amulet etc.) Barrows degrading while combat. Max hit formulas. Weapon accuracy.
Npc's Attack/Block/Death sounds NPC aggression Custom NPC Combat actions.
Magic Modern spells. Ancient spells. God spells. Freezing. Teleport blocking. Vengeance. High / Low level alching.
Ranging Bow speeds. Most of arrows / bolts data. Crossbows. Bolts effects. Specials.
Cooking Fire cooking, Range cooking. Cooking a fish (All fish support). Meats. Cakes and pies Stews and Pizzas Burning formula
Firemaking Autowalk. All logs support. Fire container. Ashes ground item registers after fire disapears. Fire lasting based on Log used.
Mining Ore enums. Pickaxes. Speeds. Rock respawning. Random rock exploding.
Farming Patches growing Raking Harvesting Watering Composting Herb patches Allotments Trees Fruit Trees Farmers can keep an eye of your patch for a fee
Slayer Task Assigning & Saving Most of tasks for each master Correct masters dialogues Slayer NPC's over the world Slayer equipment Slayer requirement for certain NPC's.
Random Eventsg Random NPC event management
Questing An interface for quests. Quest Points Tutorial Island Cook's Assistant [i]More to Come[/i]
Minigames Castle Wars Warriors Guild Pest control Duel Arena
Duel Arena: Challenging (sending a request, accepting a request) Interface configs and rules setting-up Staking (two containers, one for each stake) Obstacles Armour taking-off based on rule selected Forfeiting Disconnection handler Scoreboard
Warriors Guild: Armour machine (placing, standing back, token-gaining). Token claiming. Cyclops (defenders randomized drops, tokens fading). Object actions.
Castle Wars: Team registering Waiting rooms Correct timers for game / waiting ticks Correct game overlay (configs, interface layout) Barriers Flags: Taking, returning, getting a point Underground handling Barricades Catapults
Miscellaneous Player following (clipped). MusicByRegion NPC actions, Object actions, Magic spells converted to scripts. Complete 474 Mapdata.
[b]Player Made Videos(Made before we went offline, all features still included)[/b] [center][youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Xc187hUUOh4&feature=relmfu[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JoDAx3aFOxs&feature=related[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wz9Y8jzzowQ[/youtube][/center]
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic6.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic5.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic3.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1154.photobucket.com/albums/p529/AnthonyA14/pic1.png[/img] [i]Will add more when I have Time[/i]
[b]Supporters[/b]
[ul][li]Ruby Forums Coder[/li][/ul]
[i]I barely know anyone here at Moparscape, so Therefore not many support me :L[/i]

item.title: AntzScape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @Chrisl1924 Chrisl1924
item.description:
@Chrisl1924 wrote:

Sorry to tell you, but this isn’t really a 602 either 0_0. But sorry for the small issue. Anyways.

-Website is nearly up and running
-The name. Well, our website name is…drumroll please…

[size=14pt]The Trinity Universe[/size]

-We chose this name because it left a lot of things open; it does not limit it to a runescape private server. The server will, of course, be called either “Trinity”, or “TrinityPk”. We may even have both, if the interest is enough.

Again, thanks for the help and support, we’ll be keeping you updated.

-Chris

Read full topic

item.description:
@Chrisl1924 wrote:

Thanks Much, We’ve started on our new project and it’s going good! We will be starting a new topic with frequent updates all the way up to launch. If you want updates, feel free to add my skype “Clemke1924”.

-Chris

item.title: AntzScape Development Thread
item.dc:creator: @Antz-Scape Antz-Scape
item.description:
@Antz-Scape wrote:

Well guys, Antz-scape has come to a fork in the road. We’ve decided to head down a new path, and start a new project based on the same principles as Antz-scape, but with slightly more aggressive goals and a new source. We have decided to change two major factors-

  1. The name
    We have decided to change Antz-scapes’ name, and go for something that looks a little more professional. We cannot disclose this as of yet, but you will be seeing the new project soon.

  2. The source/ verison
    We are going with a 508 version, loading items up to 607, hopefully loading 700+. Now, we are using a PI base, with a complete content overhaul. This will be done between the two developers at the present moment, but if you would like to help, feel free to message this account.

Thank you very much for your interest and support in antz-scape over the years, and we look forward to seeing you on our new project.

The Antzscape developers

-Chris and Anthony

Read full topic

item.description:

Thanks for the feedback all. We will take it into account in future updates/ projects.

[center]

AntzScape is a 317 Server, loading 602 Anims, Items, etc. AntzScape first Started in 2008, but I am not gonna go into detail about the history and why it went down.

Well, enough talking, lets get on with the Thread!

Features
Will color Code later
Combat

Player versus Player.
Player versus NPC.
Custom combat actions.

Modern spells.

Most of arrows / bolts data.

More to Come

Pest control
Duel Arena

Duel Arena:
Challenging (sending a request, accepting a request)
Interface configs and rules setting-up
Staking (two containers, one for each stake)
Obstacles
Armour taking-off based on rule selected

Scoreboard

Warriors Guild:

Token claiming.

Object actions.
